codes.DRCT: Member has full rights in the system. In principle, this membership status entails financial responsibility for its own operations and sponsored members' operations submitted to the system.
codes.EURO: Member is entitled to access the Euro1 system of the Euro Banking Association (EBA).
codes.IDRT: Member has limited rights in the system specifications. In principle, this membership status entails no financial responsibility for its operations submitted to the system.
codes.RMTE: Member has access to the system from a remote location or through remote technical means.
codes.STEP: Member is entitled to access the Step1 system of the Euro Banking Association (EBA).

description: Specifies the nature of the membership of a party in a system, as published in an external system member type code set.
name: ExternalSystemMemberType1Code
